TEXT.S: Tjavatjavang i Pingtung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Tjavatjavang. u kasalumaluma' nu Tjavatjavang sa, 132 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 404 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 393 ku tademaw, pakalatu 97%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 11 ku tademaw, pakalatu 3%. u kasabinacadan, Paiwan 88%, Rukai 3%, Bunun 1%, Tayal 1%, zumazuma 3%.
